answers.answer: I had GD with my second child. It was easly controlled with diet. Eat less sugar and carbs and add much much more protien to diet.1st preg gained 55 pounds and with 2cd (GD) only gained 19-thanks to the diet they put me on.

Hi! I am currently 14 wks 3 days pregnant.  I had to take a early glucose test due to my weight.  I failed the 1 hr test and the 3 hr and have gd. I freaked at first. But he has given me a strict diet, and a monitor to control my sugar intake.  It seems to be going pretty good now that i am controling my sugar intake.  With my first glucose it came back 155.  So they may go ahead and give u a glucose test. But my dr informed that as long as you do keep your sugar down your not considered high risk and everything could still be ok.  I have a 6 yr old and didn't have gd with her, so i understand, i was a little upset too.  Well good luck and i hope everything will be ok for u!! :)
